name: Core - 9
description:
Core - 9

Core - 9 is a puzzle platformer made in 3 days for the weekly game Jam 147 in which the theme was invisible ! Complete levels using your Core ability which allows you to see the invisible platforms and tricks I put in the game.

Also not an artist so the art is minimal / No Existent but don't hate me or ill delete your fortnite account kid.

Also find the secret code in game. First dummy to get it (who isn't a friend) will get a 30$ steam code ! There name and proof will be posted here :)

-Atlas

SPECIAL THANKS TO SWADER & LUIC
